ygData.subject: Re: Lets invite someone from Verant to join the list
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Good proposal, Galtin - I ll get right on it, and run it past Tormin. Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:38 AM 8/27/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Perhaps the moderator of this list can send an email to Verant and request
>that the bard programmer join this list. Include in the message that we as
>representatives of the EQ bard community are requesting this not so much as
>a way for us to get detailed explanations of game mechanics but instead as a
>way to get official confirmation on theories that we have tested and believe
>to be true. For example, if someone has a theory on how a song works, the
>bard programmer could confirm if he was right or not. If the response is
>that the theory is wrong, thats all he has to say. It would be up to us to
>figure it out from there.
>
>This may be wishful thinking on my part but its worth a shot. If the
>moderator doesn't want to write the letter, I can do it. Either way I think
>the message should be posted here first for us to agree it is worded good
>enough to at least get a yes/no response.

Good proposal, Galtin - I'll get right on it, and run it past Tormin.

Talies
